long_description: Convert your Burley trailer into a walking stroller with this easy-to-use conversion kit. Includes a retractable front wheel that stays attached after inital mounting; adjustable tracking keeps wheel in alignment. With wheel attached you can pull the trailer to your destination, unhitch the trailer, swing the wheel down and be off on a walk or stroll. Lightweight, adjustable towing arm and long stroller wheelbase make steering and handling effortless.
short_description: Convert your Burley trailer into a walking stroller with this easy-to-use conversion kit.
